SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Network.Listener

Class ListenerRMI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Network.Listener.ListenerRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerListenerRemoteInterface, Runnable, Remote, Unreferenced
public class ListenerRMI extends Object implements Runnable, ServerListenerRemoteInterface, Unreferenced
ListenerRMI class is responsible for listening to incoming RMI connection requests from clients. When a request is received, it creates a ClientHandler to further handle the client's connection.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ListenerRMI()
    Constructs a ListenerRMI object and initializes the server RMI registry
